job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, NLP
job.description: stronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongYou will be the key player in a talented machine learning and NLP team tobrulli Develop text NLP and ML applications for various Zoom products lili Propose and design the best suitable ML and NLP models or algorithms based on the product requirements lili Build ML pipelines such as model training evaluation and monitoring system and deploy in production utilizing AWS cloud lili Collaborate with various teams including offshore teams communicating requirements providing technical leadership code review production integration and deployment and result evaluation liulstrongstrong Requirements brstrongstrongulli PhD or MS in NLP Machine Learning Computer Science or a related technical field lili Industry experience in machine learning applications in production lili Experience in developing pipeline components and processes such as inference and training pipeline model evaluation monitoring AB testing etc lili Fluent in English writing and speaking strong communication skills to work with different teams and stakeholders lili Expertise knowledge in NLP such as text classification sentiment analysis topic modeling text summarization ranking text similarity tokenization wordsentencedoc embedding NER POS PartOfSpeech tagging and parsing intent detection slot filler dialog flow knowledge graph lili Expertise in Machine Learning ML  Deep Learning DL and NLP algorithms CNN LSTM BERT XLNet GPT etc techniques transfer learning transformers etc Handson experience on developing and training models with largescale text data lili Experience with opensource ML  DL  NLP toolkits such as TensorFlow Caffe PyTorch CoreNLP OpenNLP StanfordNLP SpaCy AllenNLP NLTK gensim etc lili Strong mastery of Python programming language and general software development skills source code management debugging testing deployment etc liulstrongstrong Preferences brstrongstrongulli Experience in Multilingual NLP Models lili AWS experience such as EKS ECR S3 lili Framework experience such as AirFlow KubeFlow MLFlow TFServing Seldon Core lili Production ML software development experience is preferred lili Strong analytical skills and attention to detail brliulHave experience in most but not all of these areas Wed still love to hear from you Please apply and well get back to you if theres a fitbrbrEnsuring a diverse and inclusive workplace where we learn from each other is core to Zooms values We welcome people of different backgrounds experiences abilities and perspectives including qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records as well as any qualified applicants requiring reasonable accommodations in accordance with the lawbrbrWe believe that the unique contributions of all Zoomies is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race religion national origin gender identity
